unnormalised: Edu-Tech Buzz: Scholarship Portals Saving Students Rs. Lakhs!
normalised: E-d-u-Tech Buzz: Scholarship Portals Saving Students Rupee Lakhs!

unnormalised: Forget endless library trips! Scholarship portals are the new cool kid on the education block, connecting students with opportunities faster than you can say "biryani"! These platforms are making funding higher education in India way less stressful. Think of it like Zomato, but for scholarships, not food.
normalised: Forget endless library trips! Scholarship portals are the new cool kid on the education block, connecting students with opportunities faster than you can say "biryani"! These platforms are making funding higher education in India way less stressful. Think of it like Zomato, but for scholarships, not food.

unnormalised: From IIT Madras aspirants to budding artists hoping to study in Santiniketan, portals like Vidyadhan and Buddy4Study are proving to be game-changers. One student from Kerala even secured a Rs. 50,000 scholarship just in time for Onam celebrations!
normalised: From I-I-T Madras aspirants to budding artists hoping to study in Santiniketan, portals like Vidyadhan and Buddy4Study are proving to be game-changers. One student from Kerala even secured a rupee fifty thousand scholarship just in time for Onam celebrations!

unnormalised: They list everything - merit-based scholarships, need-based grants, even opportunities for students pursuing niche courses. Experts say these portals boost access to education, especially for students in remote areas with limited internet connectivity. Imagine not having to travel 200 km just to find out about scholarship details! #EdTech #Scholarships #India #Education

Experts say these portals boost access to education, especially for students in remote areas with limited internet connectivity.
